parameters.name: BackupEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the cross-region backup feature on the instance. This parameter specifies whether you can back up data and logs. Valid values:

*   **0**: disables the feature.
*   **1:** enables the feature.

> Before you enable the cross-region backup feature, you must configure the CrossBackupRegion parameter.

parameters.name: CrossBackupRegion
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the cross-region backup files of the instance are stored.

parameters.name: CrossBackupType
parameters.description: The policy that is used to save the cross-region backup files of the instance. Set the value to **1**. The value 1 specifies that all cross-region backup files are saved.

parameters.name: LogBackupEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the cross-region log backup feature on the instance. Valid values:

*   **0**: disables the feature.
*   **1:** enables the feature.

> You can enable the cross-region log backup feature only when the cross-region backup feature is enabled.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the source instance. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: RetentType
parameters.description: The policy that is used to retain the cross-region backup files of the instance. Set the value to 1. The value **1** specifies that the cross-region backup files of the instance are retained based on the specified retention period.

parameters.name: Retention
parameters.description: The number of days for which the cross-region backup files of the instance are retained. Valid values: **7 to 1825**.
